/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees, their leaves forming a green canopy that contrasts with the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth and texture to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings and cars.
